textos_fuente.text: Leadership - AEO-Inc Skip to content AEO-Inc About AEO About AEO Letter from our CEO Leadership AEO Board of Directors Our Brands American Eagle Aerie OFFLINE Todd Snyder Unsubscribed News + Media Work Here AEO Culture IDEA Benefits Retail Careers Corporate Careers Distribution Center Careers Campus Recruiting Investor Relations Press Releases Events & Presentations Financials & Filings ESG Stock Information Investor Resources AEO Better World ESG Report Giving Back AEO Better World Foundation Brand Partnerships Sustainability Responsible Sourcing Contact Us Shop AE + Aerie Leadership We Lead With Innovation Executive Leadership Jay Schottenstein Executive Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer Since 1992, Jay has been a visionary leader for American Eagle Outfitters. Together, with his father Jerome Schottenstein, the two forged a path that led to the evolution of AEO from a single brand company, to a multi-brand global business. Jay has been instrumental in the successful growth of American Eagle and the launch of the Aerie brand, and has built a strong foundation for AEO’s leading market position. Jay returned to AEO as Chief Executive Officer in 2014, a position he previously held from 1992 to 2002. He has served as AEO’s Chairman of the Board continuously since 1992, and he remains one of our largest shareholders. Jay’s expertise across apparel merchandising, operations, retail, real estate, brand development and team management provides valuable leadership and vision for the company. Jay also serves as Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer of Schottenstein Stores Corporation. He currently is Chairman of the Board of DSW Inc., a leading footwear and accessories retailer, and previously held the position of Chief Executive Officer from 2005 to 2009. READ A LETTER FROM OUR CEO › LEARN MORE › READ MORE + Jennifer Foyle President, Executive Creative Director – AE & Aerie Jen joined AEO in August 2010 to lead the Aerie brand and expanded her scope to also oversee the strategic vision of American Eagle in 2020, rising to the position of President, Executive Creative Director – AE & Aerie. She has been an instrumental force in Aerie’s rapid expansion to a nearly $2 billion brand and has been the catalyst for fueling the next chapter of growth at AE. In her role, Jen leads Design, Merchandising, Marketing, Visual and Business Strategies. In 2014, Jen revolutionized the intimate apparel industry by bringing body positivity and inclusivity to the forefront with the power of #AerieREAL. This movement has been a game-changer for the Aerie business and for millions of women and girls who have been empowered to love their REAL selves inside and out. Throughout her tenure, Jen has assembled and developed a strong bench of talent at all levels and across functions. Most recently, Jen was recognized as one of the Top Women in Retail by Women in Retail Leadership Circle and was honored with the Vanguard Award from Delivering Good for creating positive change for those in need. In 2022, Jen was named of the 50 Women in Power by WWD x FN x BEAUTYINC for her passion and leadership in continuing to grow the American Eagle and Aerie brands, and was also recognized as Women in Retail’s Top Woman of the Year. Jen was previously honored by AdWeek with a prestigious Brand Genius award, which recognizes exceptional talent, insight, creativity and bravery in business. Aerie’s commitment to body confidence and empowerment has also been recognized with Glossy’s Best Influencer Campaign in 2018, a Femmy Award in 2017, and the NEDA Inspires Award in 2015, among others. Jen began her career at Bloomingdales and held positions of increasing responsibility at Gap Inc. and J. Crew. Prior to joining Aerie in 2010 she was the President of the global lifestyle brand, Calypso St. Barth. Jen has nearly 30 years of experience in the apparel retail industry. READ MORE + Marisa Baldwin Executive Vice President, Chief Human Resources Officer Marisa joined AEO in September 2021 as Executive Vice President – Chief Human Resources Officer, overseeing all aspects of the associate experience and the company’s vibrant culture. She provides the strategic vision for the human resources team, which includes talent acquisition and retention, learning and development, total rewards, and people operations and analytics. Marisa also provides executive oversight for the AEO Better World Foundation and IDEA. AEO’s most important asset is its people and Marisa is committed to upholding a community of belonging and purpose where associates are excited to work and grow their careers. Marisa has more than 25 years of experience in Human Resources and most recently held the position of EVP – CHRO for Ascena retail group. Before joining AEO, she served in leadership roles focused on growth and expansion of Starbucks and building a culture of inclusion at Diageo, North America. READ MORE + Sarah Clarke Executive Vice President – Chief Supply Chain and Technology Officer Sarah joined AEO in October 2023 as Executive Vice President – Chief Supply Chain Officer. In this role, she directs all facets of the company’s global supply chain operations, including Product Development, Sourcing, Production, and Distribution for AEO’s diverse portfolio of brands, as well as Quiet. Sarah’s role expanded to Chief Supply Chain and Technology Officer in October 2024. Under her leadership, the Technology team is driving innovation, evolving as a strategic enabling partner and playing a pivotal role in advancing AEO’s business priorities. With a talent-first and performance-driven approach, Sarah is dedicated to achieving operational excellence and driving robust commercial results through a best-in-class team. Sarah is a strategic leader with more than two decades of extensive experience in supply chain management across several large-scale, multi-brand retail organizations. Prior to joining AEO, she served as Chief Supply Chain Officer at PVH Corporation, where she was instrumental in overseeing global supply chain operations. Sarah also held significant leadership roles at Gap Inc., where she spearheaded optimizing the company’s supply chain and managed key initiatives in New York, San Francisco and Hong Kong. Throughout her career, Sarah has successfully led major integrations, including Warnaco at PVH and Athleta at Gap Inc., demonstrating her expertise in driving growth and operational efficiency. Sarah has been a valued member of the Executive Board of the American Apparel & Footwear Association (AAFA) since 2018, serving as Chair from 2022 to 2023. Additionally, she contributes as a non-executive board member of American Securities. READ MORE + Mike Mathias Executive Vice President, Chief Financial Officer Mike first joined the company more than 20 years ago and has a deep knowledge of AEO’s stores and operations, in both finance and operational areas including e-commerce, store finance, Aerie planning, strategy and business development. In his current role, Mike oversees numerous business areas, including Finance, Legal, Real Estate & Construction, Global Asset Protection, Workforce Management, Internal Audit, Investor Relations and Corporate Communications. Mike is a strategic leader with a unique and significant understanding of the company’s industry-leading business. His operational and financial expertise are instrumental in driving AEO’s profitable growth. From 2017 – 2020, Mike served as AEO’s Senior Vice President – Financial Planning & Analysis. From 2016 – 2017, he departed AEO to serve as VP, Financial Planning and Analysis at General Nutrition Centers, Inc. Mike began his career at May Company. READ MORE + Valerie van Ogtrop Executive Vice President – Brand Operations Valerie joined AEO in October 2023 as Executive Vice President – Brand Operations where she has full accountability for Brand Finance and Strategy, Merchandise Planning, Workforce Management, and AEO Stores and Store Operations throughout the U.S. and Canada. In this role, Valerie utilizes her deep industry knowledge to set the long-term vision for driving greater brand collaboration and fueling continued profitable topline and bottom-line growth across the American Eagle and Aerie brands. Valerie joins AEO after spending 19 years with J.Crew, where she most recently led the expansion of Madewell as Executive Vice President – Brand Operations. She previously held several leadership roles at Gap Inc. in Merchandising, Merchandise Planning, and Corporate Planning. READ MORE + Follow AEO Inc. © 2025 AEO Management Co. Get ready for Trivia Night , the ultimate midweek hangout! Join us every Thursday for a fun-filled evening brought to you by the trivia pros at Quiz Meisters . Put your knowledge to the test while enjoying breathtaking views from our rooftop bar, sipping on cold drinks, and munching on delicious bites. It's the perfect combo of brains, banter, and good times! Here’s what’s in store: Free Entry – No cover charge, just bring your A-game! Awesome Prizes – The more you know, the more you win Great Vibes – Chill with friends, make new ones, and soak up the atmosphere Whether you’re a trivia champ or just in it for the laughs, it’s always a blast. So, gather your squad, grab your drink of choice, and let’s get quizzical! See you every Thursday at Eagles Nest for the most fun you can have on a rooftop! Quiz Meisters are in the house, and it's game on! Good Tapas and I would like to send a big thanks to Jasmine for all your help selecting the cocktails; they were absolutely fantastic! You nailed it. - Amanda W - Tripadvisor NYE party here was excellent. Great views; terrific venue with a lot of fun people. It is a great event with excellent music that catered for all ages. Loved it and woiuld go back. - antmanb - Tripadvisor This is the second time we have held an event at The Point. Guests attending the function are always surprised with the position and the sensational view. A special thanks the Function team as they are more than helpful with all our requirements. - triantafilla - Tripadvisor Awesome place for our company Xmas party, the staff really looked after us, food was great and the views are awesome. No hesitation in recommending them! - tobyu415 - Tripadvisor Fantastic place for my twins 21st party, the staff really looked after us, food was great and the views are awesome. Would consider booking another function. We also stayed in the hotel overnight everything was great, rooms very clean and spacious . - E8859IIjoannef - Tripadvisor Venue certainly has a very comfortable bar vibe with the best view over the river and city. We very much enjoyed the tapas treats which were of a wide variety and were prompt in their delivery. - Julie H - Tripadvisor Make an Enquiry Please fill out the online enquiry form below and one of our friendly staff will be in contact with you as soon as possible. © Copyright 2025 Eagles Nest Restaurant Website & Photography by © Pebble Design Back To Top Home Privacy Opening Times Thur - Sun: 3pm - 9pm Mon - Wed: CLOSED Level 12, The Point Brisbane Hotel, Lambert Street, Kangaroo Point Queensland 4169 Phone 1800 088 388 Email info@eaglesnestbrisbane.com.au Book a table

Meet the team at Nest Bedding
– Nest Bedding® Lifetime Renewal Exchange A comfort layer exchange you can redeem once , at any time, to alter the feel of your mattress or to increase its lifespan (this option saves you time and money while reducing waste). Learn more Account Log in Sign Up ` Forgot password? Subscribe to our newsletter for updates, new products and special offers! Sign up for SMS messaging By checking the box, I consent to receive recurring automated marketing by text message through an automatic telephone dialing system. Consent is not a condition to purchase. Message and Data rates may apply. Opt-out by texting STOP. Feels Guide Select plush if you... …are a side sleeper. …are looking for pressure point relief and gentle support. …are a lighter sleeper, under 140 lbs. …know plush is right for you and prefer a soft mattress. Select medium if you... …are a combination sleeper, back and side sleeper. …want to feel supported by your mattress, with a little give. …are an average weight. …are not sure which feel to choose. Medium is our most popular! Select firm if you... …mainly sleep on your back or stomach. …are a side or back sleeper who require additional lumbar support. …recommended to, by a medical professional. …prefer a firm sleeping surface, with a plush pillow top. Size Guide Size Inches Crib 5 28 x 52 x 5 Crib 6 28 x 52 x 6 Twin 38 38 x 75 Twin XL 38 38 x 80 Twin 39 39 x 75 Twin XL 39 39 x 80 Full 54 x 75 Queen 60 x 80 King (Eastern) 76 x 80 CalKing 72 x 84 Sleeper Guide Back Sleeper Back sleepers typically wake up in the morning on their backs. Side Sleeper Side sleepers will generally spend the most time sleeping on their left side Stomach Sleeper Stomach sleepers gravitate towards firm surfaces. Combination Sleeper Combination sleepers are a mix of many sleep positions. If you are not quite sure which mattress fits your sleep style, don't worry. Speak with an Expert Nestologist today! Material Guide Hybrid Our US made hybrid mattresses are constructed with individually wrapped coil systems that relieve pressure and add extra support to the edge of the bed. Specialty Foam Engineered to with improved responsiveness and to regulate heat more efficiently. Memory Foam Traditional foam that is much softer, designed to relieve pressure points and conform to your body. Latex Durable, Relieves Pressure Points, Responsive, Natural Material. Organic mattresses are Global Organic Latex Standard certified that the organic latex used in our products contain more than 95% of certified organic raw latex. Natural & Organic Soft, durable wool sourced from New Zealand and Certified Organic Cotton. We use organic materials in our Natural mattresses. Our Organic mattresses meet Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) requirements; ensures that organic cotton and organic wool used in our products are free from harmful chemicals. Dual Firmness Our luxury hybrid mattresses are available in dual firmness. Either side of the mattress can be customized to the sleeper; ideal for couples who can't make up their mind. Flippable Two Nest Bedding mattresses are flippable. Not sure which firmness you'll want, then this is a great fit. Commitment to Sustainability It’s our hope that more companies will focus on making sustainable products in the future. Until then, you can rely on Nest Bedding to make sustainable, environmentally-friendly bedding. Meet the family at Nest Bedding that literally has your back. We're a family-owned and operated D2C brand, making strides to improve sleep and preserve our planet for future generations. Meet the flock behind Nest Bedding. Meet the family at Nest Bedding that literally has your back. We're a family-owned and operated D2C brand, making strides to improve sleep and preserve our planet for future generations. Our Leadership Team [roll over a team member to reveal their favorite bird] Christian Alexander Owner & CEO Christian helped to estblish the first Nest Bedding showrooms in 2012. He officially joined his father's business in 2015 and brought a wealth of medical knowledge and military leadership experience with him. He served honorably in the US Navy as an FMF Hospital Corpsman, and then earned a Bachelors in Science and Healthcare Administration. Now he's working with the very capable team he had the privilege of establishing, to bring you the highest standard of quality in sleep and the best customer experience in the mattress and bedding industry. Favorite Nest Product: My 7-year-old Easy Breather Pillow , aptly named “Squishy”. Favorite Recreational Activity: Cooking, playing my ukulele, and mountain biking with my kids. Favorite Bird: Great Horned Owl Mikey Rademacher Director of Operations Coming from a Barista position with one company, a sales position with another, and working with youth, my past positions have been heavily influenced by the relationships that I have created with others. I’ve enjoyed taking those past experiences and applying them to my Operations position here at Nest Bedding! Outside of work, I love spending time with my family, friends, and pets. I enjoy getting outside and working in the backyard. My family is what (literally) gets me out of bed in the morning and makes me excited for the day! Favorite Nest Product: The Easy Breather Pillow , best pillow out there! Favorite Recreational activity: Golfing and Fishing. Favorite Bird: Macaw Brooke Alexander Owner & CBO As Chief Brand Officer of Nest Bedding, I bring a deep passion for health and wellness to everything we do. I started my career as a massage therapist, specializing in sports therapy and holistic medicine, working with athletes across the U.S. at Ironman events, marathons, and biking competitions. After settling in Los Angeles in 2014, I joined the family business and opened Nest Bedding’s first LA showroom. Applying my expertise in body mechanics, I helped customers find the best sleep solutions. Since then, I’ve led the expansion of our retail operations and taken charge of product development, design, branding, and customer experience, shaping Nest Bedding into a leader in luxury sleep solutions. Favorite Nest Product: My Sparrow mattress . I wish I could take it with me everywhere! Favorite Recreational activity: Mountain biking for sure is my favorite pass time. My brother and our CEO, Christian, will have said the same thing only because he is a copycat and I introduced him to the sport. Favorite Bird: Allen’s Hummingbird Heathir Davis Director of Customer Engagement I have always had jobs working with people and love being in the customer service industry. I joined the Nest family in October of 2018, exactly 1 month before a wildfire burned down the town where we lived in Northern California. Now we are living in Florida and loving it! I love my family and my dogs. I count it a privilege to lead such an amazing customer service team. They truly care about people and want them to sleep better. Favorite Nest Product: My Owl Latex Hybrid mattress . Best sleep ever! Favorite Recreational activity: All things Disney! Favorite Bird: Cockatoo Charles Eisenbarth Chief Solutions Officer I’ve been a part of the Nest Bedding team since April of 2018. Prior to that, my career consisted of various roles in retail, customer service, operations, and IT… which provided a sound professional foundation for my transition to Nest. Since then my role has expanded to incorporate all of those functions to varying degrees and more! For me, every day at Nest presents a new opportunity to refine or reframe processes that will allow Nest teams to be more successful in what their day requires of them. Favorite Nest Product: Finch (Firm), Easy Breather Side Sleeper , and Organic Cotton Sheets ! Favorite Recreational activity: Traveling, camping and movie nights with the family. Favorite Bird: Red-tailed Hawk Marie Murray Senior Marketing Manager From photography and digital design to e-commerce management, my journey has shaped my passion for creating exceptional online experiences. Over the years, I’ve honed my skills in operations, marketing, and website management, gaining valuable insight into what makes an online business thrive. Since joining Nest Bedding in 2019, I’ve been dedicated to crafting a seamless and relaxing shopping experience—helping customers turn dreams into reality, one comfy mattress at a time! Favorite Nest Product: My Easy Breather Side Sleeper Pillow that works for my ever changing sleep positions. Favorite Recreational activity: Apartment gardening, photography, and curling up on the couch to watch anime. Favorite Bird: Real, a carrion crow. For fun, Ash's sleepy Rowlet from Pokemon. Trevor Davis Chief People Officer Starting in 1994 I had a Homebuilding company. For 7 years we built up a large successful company in Dallas Texas. Deciding on a career change I went in a totally other direction and was a Director of the Boys and Girls Clubs and served as a pastor for 17 years. I've been fortunate to speak and do training across the US and really enjoy being a problem solver. I've also been privileged to sit as a board member of many unique organizations. I'm someone who is passionate about building and growing team members and helping people and organizations move forward. I am fortunate enough to be in charge of Culture and People. Nest bedding has an amazing group of Nestologists that make this one of the best-rated places to be employed. Favorite Nest Product: My Easy Breather side sleeper pillow and my Owl mattress . Favorite Recreational activity: Traveling and experiencing different Cultures and places all over the planet. Favorite Bird: Big Bird…yeah…from sesame street…. Or a Sand Crane. Christian Alexander Owner & CEO Christian helped to estblish the first Nest Bedding showrooms in 2012. He officially joined his father's business in 2015 and brought a wealth of knowledge and leadership experience with him. Serving in the US Navy as an FMF Hospital Corpsman, and then achieving Bachelors in Science and Healthcare Administration. Now he's working with the very capable team he had the privilege of establishing, to bring you the highest standard of quality in sleep and the best customer experience in the mattress and bedding industry. Favorite Nest Product: My 7-year-old Easy Breather Pillow , aptly named “Squishy”. Favorite Recreational Activity: Cooking, playing my ukulele, and mountain biking with my kids. Favorite Bird: Great Horned Owl Brooke Alexander Owner & CEO I have always been fascinated with the health and wellness of the human body. At a young age, I pursued a career as a massage therapist where I specialized in sports therapy and holistic medicine. For several years I was fortunate enough to travel around the US working with athletes in ironman events, marathons and biking competitions. I settled in the Los Angeles area in 2014 and soon after I moved to LA, I had the opportunity to join the family business and open the first Nest Bedding showroom in Los Angeles California. There I found I was able to apply my unique expertise and knowledge of the human body to help guide customers to the best mattress and bedding solutions for their needs. Since then, I have paved the way for the expansion of all retail operations within Nest Bedding. I have also taken a lead in product development, design, branding, and customer experience. It has been a great honor of mine to have been able to take our family business to the next level with our unique luxury product offerings. Favorite Nest Product: My Sparrow mattress . I wish I could take it with me everywhere! Favorite Recreational activity: Mountain biking for sure is my favorite pass time. My brother and our CEO, Christian, will have said the same thing only because he is a copycat and I introduced him to the sport. Favorite Bird: Allen’s Hummingbird Charles Eisenbarth Chief Solutions Officer I’ve been a part of the Nest Bedding team since April of 2018. Prior to that, my career consisted of various roles in retail, customer service, operations, and IT… which provided a sound professional foundation for my transition to Nest. Since then my role has expanded to incorporate all of those functions to varying degrees and more! For me, every day at Nest presents a new opportunity to refine or reframe processes that will allow Nest teams to be more successful in what their day requires of them. Favorite Nest Product: Finch (Firm), Easy Breather Side Sleeper , and Organic Cotton Sheets ! Favorite Recreational activity: Traveling, camping and movie nights with the family. Favorite Bird: Red-tailed Hawk Trevor Davis Chief People Officer Starting in 1994 I had a Homebuilding company. For 7 years we built up a large successful company in Dallas Texas. Deciding on a career change I went in a totally other direction and was a Director of the Boys and Girls Clubs and served as a pastor for 17 years. I've been fortunate to speak and do training across the US and really enjoy being a problem solver. I've also been privileged to sit as a board member of many unique organizations. I'm someone who is passionate about building and growing team members and helping people and organizations move forward. I am fortunate enough to be in charge of Culture and People. Nest bedding has an amazing group of Nestologists that make this one of the best-rated places to be employed. Favorite Nest Product: My Easy Breather side sleeper pillow and my Owl mattress . Favorite Recreational activity: Traveling and experiencing different Cultures and places all over the planet. Favorite Bird: Big Bird…yeah…from sesame street…. Or a Sand Crane. Mikey Rademacher Director of Operations Coming from a Barista position with one company, a sales position with another, and working with youth, my past positions have been heavily influenced by the relationships that I have created with others. I’ve enjoyed taking those past experiences and applying them to my Operations position here at Nest Bedding! Outside of work, I love spending time with my family, friends, and pets. I enjoy getting outside and working in the backyard. My family is what (literally) gets me out of bed in the morning and makes me excited for the day! Favorite Nest Product: The Easy Breather Pillow , best pillow out there! Favorite Recreational activity: Golfing and Fishing. Favorite Bird: Macaw Heathir Davis Director of Customer Engagement I have always had jobs working with people and love being in the customer service industry. I joined the Nest family in October of 2018, exactly 1 month before a wildfire burned down the town where we lived in Northern California. Now we are living in Florida and loving it! I love my family and my dogs. I count it a privilege to lead such an amazing customer service team. They truly care about people and want them to sleep better. Favorite Nest Product: My Owl Latex Hybrid mattress . Best sleep ever! Favorite Recreational activity: All things Disney! Favorite Bird: Cockatoo Marie Murray Senior Marketing Manager From photography and digital design to e-commerce management, my journey has shaped my passion for creating exceptional online experiences. Over the years, I’ve honed my skills in operations, marketing, and website management, gaining valuable insight into what makes an online business thrive. Since joining Nest Bedding in 2019, I’ve been dedicated to crafting a seamless and relaxing shopping experience—helping customers turn dreams into reality, one comfy mattress at a time! Favorite Nest Product: My Easy Breather Side Sleeper Pillow that works for my ever changing sleep positions. Favorite Recreational activity: Apartment gardening, photography, and curling up on the couch to watch anime. Favorite Bird: Real, a carrion crow. For fun, Ash's sleepy Rowlet from Pokemon. Celebrating 10+ Years Founded in 2011, Nest Bedding was one of the first bed-in-a-box brands, now sells mattresses for every-body in your home. They ship factory-direct right to your doorstep for free, with an industry-leading 365-Night Sleep Trial. Complete your bedroom with an array of luxury top-of-bed products by Nest, including pillows, sheet sets, duvet covers, comforters, blankets, toppers, and sleep accessories. We continue to strive to make our mattresses, bedding, and furniture, as sustainable as possible, through increased quality and consumer-friendly policies. Our goal is to help our customers get the most life possible out of their Nest. Thank you for shopping with us. -Christian Alexander, CEO and Expert Nestologist Commitment to Comfort & Sustainability In 2021, Nest Bedding became the world’s first mattress company to offer a Lifetime Renewal Exchange (LRE) program for our luxury mattresses. The LRE is a one-time comfort guarantee that can be redeemed either during your first 365-nights of sleep or years after. Renew your mattress when it’s right for you. Breath new life into your mattress with an exchange for a brand new comfort layer and save yourself the time and money it takes to shop for a new mattress. DoorDash Experience the Best Gastro Pub in Crestview, FL Eagle's Nest at Blackwater is your go-to gastropub in Crestview, FL, offering a delightful dining experience with a wide range of food options and a vibrant atmosphere. Our Restaurant's Menu Indulge in our diverse menu featuring classic pub fare and innovative dishes. With 20 draft beers on tap, brunch options, and daily meal specials, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Whether you're in the mood for a hearty burger, fresh seafood, or a light salad, our menu has it all. Learn More Weekly Events at Our Gastro Pub Join us for special events every day of the week! Dinner was fabulous !  We ordered a variety of items off the menu and it exceeded all of our expectations!!!   Jason was great and very knowledgeable about anything we had questions on!   Go check them out!!!
